name: Delta Strike! - Prototype
description:
Hey guys! This is a game prototype i made and i thought i would upload it! I hope you like it! i made it with the standard unity assets pack and some other free stuff i found on the asset store. Anyway... hope you have fun with it! 😎

Let me know what you think in the comments and if i should continue it.... 😁 Thanks!

Cheers!

CONTROLS: Use A, S, D, or W (or the arrow keys) to control the plane Shift is boost Left mouse button is engine cut-off Space is machine guns! Toggle more guns on the top right! Enter is rockets!
